languages.text: {n}Вы, конечно, слышали эту историю. Кто не слышал о святом Друзе? В деталях вы, конечно, разбираетесь не так хорошо, как преподобный, но вроде он нигде не наврал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы, конечно, слышали эту историю. Кто не слышал о святом Друзе? В деталях вы, конечно, разбираетесь не так хорошо, как преподобный, но вроде он нигде не наврал.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You've obviously heard this story before. Who hasn't heard of Saint Drusus? You may not be as versed in the details as Reverend Hieronymus, but his description of the events seems to check out.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы, конечно, слышали эту историю. Кто не слышал о святом Друзе? В деталях вы, конечно, разбираетесь не так хорошо, как преподобный, но вроде он нигде не наврал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You've obviously heard this story before. Who hasn't heard of Saint Drusus? You may not be as versed in the details as Father Hieronimus, but his description of the events seems to check out.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，这个故事你耳熟能详。毕竟，有谁没听说过圣德鲁苏斯的故事呢？或许你并不像希罗尼穆斯那样，了解这个故事的所有细节，但他对事情的描述应该是正确的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've obviously heard this story before. Who hasn't heard of Saint Drusus? You may not be as versed in the details as Reverend Hieronymus, but his description of the events seems to check out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，这个故事你耳熟能详。毕竟，有谁没听说过圣德鲁苏斯的故事呢？或许你并不像希罗尼穆斯那样，了解这个故事的所有细节，但他对事情的描述应该是正确的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es evidente que ya conoces la historia. ¿Quién no ha oído hablar de san Drusus? Quizá no recuerdes tantos detalles como el reverendo Hieronymus, pero su descripción de los eventos es correcta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've obviously heard this story before. Who hasn't heard of Saint Drusus? You may not be as versed in the details as Reverend Hieronymus, but his description of the events seems to check out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es evidente que ya conoces la historia. ¿Quién no ha oído hablar de san Drusus? Quizá no recuerdes tantos detalles como el reverendo Hieronymus, pero su descripción de los eventos es correcta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}以前もこの話を聞いたことがある。聖ドルススを知らない者など存在するのだろうか？ヒエロニムス司祭ほど詳しくはないが、彼の話に間違いはないと思われる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've obviously heard this story before. Who hasn't heard of Saint Drusus? You may not be as versed in the details as Reverend Hieronymus, but his description of the events seems to check out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}以前もこの話を聞いたことがある。聖ドルススを知らない者など存在するのだろうか？ヒエロニムス司祭ほど詳しくはないが、彼の話に間違いはないと思われる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast diese Geschichte natürlich schon gehört. Alle kennen den Hl. Drusus! Dir mögen die Einzelheiten nicht so vertraut sein wie Reverend Hieronymus, aber seine Schilderung der Ereignisse scheint zu stimmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've obviously heard this story before. Who hasn't heard of Saint Drusus? You may not be as versed in the details as Reverend Hieronymus, but his description of the events seems to check out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast diese Geschichte natürlich schon gehört. Alle kennen den Hl. Drusus! Dir mögen die Einzelheiten nicht so vertraut sein wie Reverend Hieronymus, aber seine Schilderung der Ereignisse scheint zu stimmen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous connaissez déjà cette histoire, bien sûr. Qui n'a jamais entendu parler de Saint Drusus ? Vous ne maîtrisez peut-être pas tous les détails de sa vie, comme le révérend Hiéronymus, mais sa description des événements vous semble correcte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've obviously heard this story before. Who hasn't heard of Saint Drusus? You may not be as versed in the details as Reverend Hieronymus, but his description of the events seems to check out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous connaissez déjà cette histoire, bien sûr. Qui n'a jamais entendu parler de Saint Drusus ? Vous ne maîtrisez peut-être pas tous les détails de sa vie, comme le révérend Hiéronymus, mais sa description des événements vous semble correcte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu hikâyeyi elbette daha önce duymuştun. Aziz Drusus'u duymayan mı kaldı zaten? Ayrıntılara Muhterem Hieronymus kadar hâkim olmasan da anlattığı olaylar bildiklerinle örtüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've obviously heard this story before. Who hasn't heard of Saint Drusus? You may not be as versed in the details as Reverend Hieronymus, but his description of the events seems to check out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu hikâyeyi elbette daha önce duymuştun. Aziz Drusus'u duymayan var mıdır ki zaten? Detaylara Muhterem Hieronymus kadar hâkim olmayabilirsin ama anlattıkları, senin bildiklerinle örtüşüyor.{/n}
